blog.name: loveandyourstrulyh
blog.title: treat people with (love and) kindness.
blog.description: know that you are loved. love others. spread love.

tags: I AM A MESSED UP VERSION OF HARRY STYLES LMAOOOOOO
body:
status update

a little anecdote: my brother woke up this morning to tell me (and i quote): “you are harry styles in a nutshell” then went on to say “you are a messed up version of him” and i don’t know where that came from nor do i know what that means. i don’t know about you but i’ll take that as a compliment any day 😂❤️

p.s.: i was gonna tell him i’m more of a jacked up version but decided against it. why? idk.

blog.name: inahazzze
blog.title: Here To Take My Medicine
blog.description: 🌈Marissa (she/her)🌈 Harry has my heart ~ My Writing ~ Follows back from @bibliosomniac

summary: I live for soft, shy boy Harry. Maybe he’s besotted but to scared to make a move because he’s never felt so intensely about...
question: I live for soft, shy boy Harry. Maybe he’s besotted but to scared to make a move because he’s never felt so intensely about someone before and he doesn’t know if he can handle the rejection. He’d rather have them in his life as friends then not at all. But maybe he just gets the courage and says fuck it and tells them how he feels.
answer:
YES THANK YOU I LOVE THIS

After being friends with Harry for over 3 years, you’d prided yourself on always being able to read him. You knew when he was upset about something, or annoyed with you, or trying to hold himself back from laughing. If you were watching a scary movie together, you knew exactly when to offer your hand to him to hold tight until he relaxed. One time you’d even gone over to his apartment with a tub of salted caramel ice cream close to midnight because you could tell that something was wrong based on the sound of his voice on the phone. He’d opened the door looking confused for only the briefest moment before breaking down in tears in your arms. You always seemed to know what he needed.

But you can’t read him today. You can tell that something is off with him, but you can’t quite put your finger on what. He’s been at your apartment for the better part of two hours, but he still hasn’t come out with it. At first it seemed like everything was fine, but then he started to pick at his nails and pinch his bottom lip between his fingers. You only ever saw him do that when he was nervous about something – but he always told you when he was anxious, and he hasn’t said anything yet. It makes you nervous too, only because this is unchartered territory between the two of you. You don’t know what to make of it, and decide to let him take his time before he decides to tell you whatever the hell is up.

He’s lounging on the couch, mindlessly scrolling through his phone while Notting Hill plays on the TV. You think he’s solely focused on his phone, but he proves you wrong when he occasionally pipes in with some of the characters’ lines. After a little while, you get bored with the movie and the unusual silence.

“Do you wanna watch something else?” You ask him. He looks affronted, as if he’s offended at the mere suggestion.

“Harry, you’ve seen this movie, like, ten times. Just with me.”

His bottom lip juts out and he looks away from you. “So? It’s a good movie.”

You roll your eyes, but play along because he just looks so damn cute. “Then why aren’t you watching it?” You retort, gesturing towards his phone. He raises his eyes at you in what you think will be a challenge, but he only puts his phone down and stares directly at the TV.

Weird. You want to say something back, but you’re thrown off by his change in behaviour. He’s never acted this way around you before, and you can’t help but wonder if it’s something you did without realising it. But if he’s mad at you, why would he have come over in the first place?

Harry watches the rest of the movie with eyes glued to the screen but seems distant, as if he’s deep in thought about something else. You watch too but can’t help but look over to him every few minutes. He doesn’t acknowledge your glances, even though you’re sure that he can see you in his peripheral vision.

Once the credits roll, neither of you move. You’re starting to get sick of waiting for him to tell you what’s wrong, but you don’t want to push him away. You’ve never had to walk on eggshells around him before and you find that it’s harder than you ever thought it might be. All you want is for everything to go back to normal.

You decide to prompt the conversation gently. “Is everything okay, Harry?”

He’s silent for a minute, and you let him take his time responding. But when he does speak, his voice sounds thin. “I’m fine. Do you wanna watch another movie?” It’s the put-on voice that you’ve heard him use around people he doesn’t know very well, when he wants to appear confident and cool. It’s not a voice he’s ever used to talk to you.

You ignore his question. “Harry.” Your voice is firm and unwavering, telling him that you’re not going to let this slide. He blushes and looks down into his lap, chipping off pieces of pink nail polish.

“I’m- I can’t-“ He starts, clearly uncomfortable. “I don’t know how to-“

“It’s okay, Harry. Whatever it is.” You try to comfort him by placing a hand on his arm, but his muscles only tense. Your brows furrow at the unexpected response and he heaves a deep sigh before looking you dead in the eyes.

“I love you. And not just as a friend. I’ve got real feelings for you, and have for a long time. I understand if you don’t-“

You break off his rambled confessions by pressing your lips against his, surprising you both. He’s soft and warm and you feel a calm certainty wash over you – nothing has ever felt so right.
answer_abstract:
YES THANK YOU I LOVE THIS

title: Twins
body:
YOU’RE GETTING ANOTHER!!! I don’t know how long LoveBird 5 will take me to write, so I’m going to let you read another piece I wrote yesterday 

The twins were Harry’s greatest achievement. Above the albums, above the travelling, even the awards. He loved his three girls more than anything, but there was something about the two little girls that you had brought into the world together. Their curly hair that matched his perfectly, though theirs were a lighter brown, almost blonde in colour; their light eyes that matched their daddy’s perfectly; and their skin that was as perfect as yours-at least that’s what Harry liked to tell you. 

Each day, no matter how tired he was, Harry would be up before you and walking into the twins’ bedroom to pick them up from their cots, bringing each of them to his chest for a hug before walking them down the stairs and towards the living room. 

Before they were born, his mornings would consist of waking up and grabbing his journal, walking to the kitchen to have a cold glass of water and a quick write of what he was feeling as he woke up. However, since the day you brought them home from the hospital nearly 18 months ago, he would wake up when they would, taking them downstairs and spending at least an hour with them before you woke up. 

Both girls would be fed before you walked downstairs, and as you entered the living room where the three loves of your life sat, Harry would kiss your lips quickly before sauntering off and bringing you a steaming cup of coffee to wake you up, all while you got to snuggle your babies and make them giggle as you tickled their pudgy little bellies. 

No matter how much time he spent with them on a morning, Harry would never dress your little girls for he knew that you loved taking them up to their room together to get them dressed for the day. 

That morning was no different. 

Harry had woken up to the smallest sound coming from your daughters’ nursery, turning off the monitor that sat next to your bed, and kissing your forehead lightly. He knew you were awake too, but he wanted to let you rest, and you wanted him to have the hour on his own with his girls. 

He hated the fact that he had to travel for work still and fretted that he was missing out on their lives, and that hour a day was all he needed to know that he was a good daddy, and that his children loved him. 

He left the bedroom and pulled the door closed softly, the only sounds being heard in your bedroom being his footsteps on the landing of your forever home. You snuggled yourself back into the covers knowing that your girls were being looked after. You could hear Harry talking to the two girls as he walked down the stairs, holding one of their hands as they slid down on their bums- something Harry knew you didn’t like and so would only do it when they were on his own with them. 

An hour later, you ventured out of the bedroom, one of Harry’s tour hoodie’s covering your top half, and down the stairs towards the living room where you heard giggles and Harry’s baby voice. 

For a while you stood in the doorway, watching your children squirm on the floor while their daddy tickled their bellies and blew raspberries on them. You smiled at the interaction, taking a deep breath and enjoying the view before you. 

“My, my, what do we have going on here?” The two little girls saw you and tried to push their dad away from them, crawling over to you and pulling at your legs. You picked them both up and held them close to your chest, watching as Harry walked over to you too. 

“Morning, gorgeous.” A small kiss was pressed to your lips before he walked toward the kitchen where you knew he was preparing you a mug of coffee. 

“You two are super lazy this morning. You both know that you can walk to mummy, yet you crawled instead. Cheeky monkeys.” You sat yourself down on the sofa and pushed yourself back, letting your babies lay on your chest and snuggle into you. Since Harry had been tickling them when you got downstairs, you enjoyed them cuddling you and wanting to be as close as they could be. 

Harry walked in with a cup of coffee, though when he saw you snuggled with his children, he placed it on the coffee table before joining you, moving his hand to be around your shoulders so he could pull you close. 

The youngest of the twins, Marcie, looked up and decided she wanted to cuddle her daddy instead, and so shifted from you onto Harry, cuddling into his neck and leaving Melodie with more room to snuggle you. 

The day you decided on names for your babies was a day you’d never forget. 

“I just don’t see either of them looking like a Bluebell if I’m being totally honest with you”. You sat on the sofa with your feet on the coffee table, your growing bump hidden under one of Harry’s hoodies, the material stretching to accompany both of your children. 

“It is a bit unusual too. What was the name you said you’d grown up loving?”

“Marcie?” Harry nodded, his lips being rolled into his mouth in a straight line.

“Hmm, I like Marcie. What do you think, girlies, do you like Marcie?” One of the babies kicked at your stomach, the spot they did protruding a little from the top. You both chuckled as you held the bump in both of your hands, rubbing it gently.  

“One of them sure does. How about Marcie Gemma Styles?” Harry looked at you with soft eyes, his lips turning into a large smile. 

“Marcie Gemma Styles. I love it. Now, what about a second name?” You shrugged your shoulders, not knowing what to call your second baby. 

Growing up you never saw yourself having twins, and so, when the sonographer told you that there were two little babies growing inside your stomach, you were scared but oh so excited. Harry had cried the entire day, constantly holding your non-existent bump and talking to the children who couldn’t yet hear him. 

“I don’t know. What I do know is that you promised to play me the beginnings of your new song”. 

“Okay, I’ll go grab my guitar.”

While you waited for Harry to run to the office of your home, you gripped your stomach and rubbed soft circles on it. 

“I don’t think you realise how much you’re already loved by your mummy and daddy. Your daddy loves you both so much that I’m scared he’s going to physically squish you when you’re born. I hope you look like him, you know? I want you to have his green eyes and his curly hair. I don’t care if you look nothing like me, I want you to be your daddy’s double.” You smiled to yourself before Harry walked back into the room, guitar in hand and smile spread across his face. 

“Now, I only have the melody so far, so please don’t hate me if this is crap.” You couldn’t reply to Harry for you were frozen in place. 

“Melodie”. 

“Melodie?” 

“With an ‘ie’. Melodie Anne Styles.” Harry’s face lit up as he put his guitar down, jogging to where you were sat with a wide smile. 

“Marcie and Melodie. I like it.” 

Your hand came to rub at your eldest’s back, the feel of her pyjamas soft under your skin. Harry replicated your touch on Marcie, who only snuggled further into his chest. Out of them both, Marcie was the daddy’s girl, while Melodie was definitely clingy toward you. It wouldn’t matter where you were, she wanted to be hugged by you and you only. 

“What are you thinking about, H?” You’d noticed Harry staring off into the distance, his eyes not blinking much but his bottom lip being pulled into his teeth. 

“I was thinking. Now you don’t have to say yes, it’s just an idea”. 

“Go on…” 

He finally looked at you, hope in his eyes as he did. 

“Can we have another baby?” Your breathing hitched slightly and Melodie shifted in your grip, your hands coming to soothe her quickly as you looked at your husband who looked like a little boy. “We don’t have to if you don’t want. It’s just, we’ve done so well with these two and could you imagine having another little baby from the start?” 

“A third baby? You think we can handle it? What about touring?” 

Harry could sense you starting to grow anxious, and so he grabbed onto your hand and brought it up to his mouth to press a soft kiss to it. 

“I don’t want to tour yet I need time with my family and to watch my girls grow up. I’m no where near close to writing another album so now’s the time to take time away. I honestly understand if you don’t want to-“ 

“I want another baby. I’d bloody love another baby with you, Harry.” 

Who’d have thought that almost a year later you’d have another set of twins…

reblog.comment:
YOU’RE GETTING ANOTHER!!! I don’t know how long LoveBird 5 will take me to write, so I’m going to let you read another piece I wrote yesterday 

The twins were Harry’s greatest achievement. Above the albums, above the travelling, even the awards. He loved his three girls more than anything, but there was something about the two little girls that you had brought into the world together. Their curly hair that matched his perfectly, though theirs were a lighter brown, almost blonde in colour; their light eyes that matched their daddy’s perfectly; and their skin that was as perfect as yours-at least that’s what Harry liked to tell you. 

Each day, no matter how tired he was, Harry would be up before you and walking into the twins’ bedroom to pick them up from their cots, bringing each of them to his chest for a hug before walking them down the stairs and towards the living room. 

Before they were born, his mornings would consist of waking up and grabbing his journal, walking to the kitchen to have a cold glass of water and a quick write of what he was feeling as he woke up. However, since the day you brought them home from the hospital nearly 18 months ago, he would wake up when they would, taking them downstairs and spending at least an hour with them before you woke up. 

Both girls would be fed before you walked downstairs, and as you entered the living room where the three loves of your life sat, Harry would kiss your lips quickly before sauntering off and bringing you a steaming cup of coffee to wake you up, all while you got to snuggle your babies and make them giggle as you tickled their pudgy little bellies. 

No matter how much time he spent with them on a morning, Harry would never dress your little girls for he knew that you loved taking them up to their room together to get them dressed for the day. 

That morning was no different. 

Harry had woken up to the smallest sound coming from your daughters’ nursery, turning off the monitor that sat next to your bed, and kissing your forehead lightly. He knew you were awake too, but he wanted to let you rest, and you wanted him to have the hour on his own with his girls. 

He hated the fact that he had to travel for work still and fretted that he was missing out on their lives, and that hour a day was all he needed to know that he was a good daddy, and that his children loved him. 

He left the bedroom and pulled the door closed softly, the only sounds being heard in your bedroom being his footsteps on the landing of your forever home. You snuggled yourself back into the covers knowing that your girls were being looked after. You could hear Harry talking to the two girls as he walked down the stairs, holding one of their hands as they slid down on their bums- something Harry knew you didn’t like and so would only do it when they were on his own with them. 

An hour later, you ventured out of the bedroom, one of Harry’s tour hoodie’s covering your top half, and down the stairs towards the living room where you heard giggles and Harry’s baby voice. 

For a while you stood in the doorway, watching your children squirm on the floor while their daddy tickled their bellies and blew raspberries on them. You smiled at the interaction, taking a deep breath and enjoying the view before you. 

“My, my, what do we have going on here?” The two little girls saw you and tried to push their dad away from them, crawling over to you and pulling at your legs. You picked them both up and held them close to your chest, watching as Harry walked over to you too. 

“Morning, gorgeous.” A small kiss was pressed to your lips before he walked toward the kitchen where you knew he was preparing you a mug of coffee. 

“You two are super lazy this morning. You both know that you can walk to mummy, yet you crawled instead. Cheeky monkeys.” You sat yourself down on the sofa and pushed yourself back, letting your babies lay on your chest and snuggle into you. Since Harry had been tickling them when you got downstairs, you enjoyed them cuddling you and wanting to be as close as they could be. 

Harry walked in with a cup of coffee, though when he saw you snuggled with his children, he placed it on the coffee table before joining you, moving his hand to be around your shoulders so he could pull you close. 

The youngest of the twins, Marcie, looked up and decided she wanted to cuddle her daddy instead, and so shifted from you onto Harry, cuddling into his neck and leaving Melodie with more room to snuggle you. 

The day you decided on names for your babies was a day you’d never forget. 

“I just don’t see either of them looking like a Bluebell if I’m being totally honest with you”. You sat on the sofa with your feet on the coffee table, your growing bump hidden under one of Harry’s hoodies, the material stretching to accompany both of your children. 

“It is a bit unusual too. What was the name you said you’d grown up loving?”

“Marcie?” Harry nodded, his lips being rolled into his mouth in a straight line.

“Hmm, I like Marcie. What do you think, girlies, do you like Marcie?” One of the babies kicked at your stomach, the spot they did protruding a little from the top. You both chuckled as you held the bump in both of your hands, rubbing it gently.  

“One of them sure does. How about Marcie Gemma Styles?” Harry looked at you with soft eyes, his lips turning into a large smile. 

“Marcie Gemma Styles. I love it. Now, what about a second name?” You shrugged your shoulders, not knowing what to call your second baby. 

Growing up you never saw yourself having twins, and so, when the sonographer told you that there were two little babies growing inside your stomach, you were scared but oh so excited. Harry had cried the entire day, constantly holding your non-existent bump and talking to the children who couldn’t yet hear him. 

“I don’t know. What I do know is that you promised to play me the beginnings of your new song”. 

“Okay, I’ll go grab my guitar.”

While you waited for Harry to run to the office of your home, you gripped your stomach and rubbed soft circles on it. 

“I don’t think you realise how much you’re already loved by your mummy and daddy. Your daddy loves you both so much that I’m scared he’s going to physically squish you when you’re born. I hope you look like him, you know? I want you to have his green eyes and his curly hair. I don’t care if you look nothing like me, I want you to be your daddy’s double.” You smiled to yourself before Harry walked back into the room, guitar in hand and smile spread across his face. 

“Now, I only have the melody so far, so please don’t hate me if this is crap.” You couldn’t reply to Harry for you were frozen in place. 

“Melodie”. 

“Melodie?” 

“With an ‘ie’. Melodie Anne Styles.” Harry’s face lit up as he put his guitar down, jogging to where you were sat with a wide smile. 

“Marcie and Melodie. I like it.” 

Your hand came to rub at your eldest’s back, the feel of her pyjamas soft under your skin. Harry replicated your touch on Marcie, who only snuggled further into his chest. Out of them both, Marcie was the daddy’s girl, while Melodie was definitely clingy toward you. It wouldn’t matter where you were, she wanted to be hugged by you and you only. 

“What are you thinking about, H?” You’d noticed Harry staring off into the distance, his eyes not blinking much but his bottom lip being pulled into his teeth. 

“I was thinking. Now you don’t have to say yes, it’s just an idea”. 

“Go on…” 

He finally looked at you, hope in his eyes as he did. 

“Can we have another baby?” Your breathing hitched slightly and Melodie shifted in your grip, your hands coming to soothe her quickly as you looked at your husband who looked like a little boy. “We don’t have to if you don’t want. It’s just, we’ve done so well with these two and could you imagine having another little baby from the start?” 

“A third baby? You think we can handle it? What about touring?” 

Harry could sense you starting to grow anxious, and so he grabbed onto your hand and brought it up to his mouth to press a soft kiss to it. 

“I don’t want to tour yet I need time with my family and to watch my girls grow up. I’m no where near close to writing another album so now’s the time to take time away. I honestly understand if you don’t want to-“ 

“I want another baby. I’d bloody love another baby with you, Harry.” 

Who’d have thought that almost a year later you’d have another set of twins…

blog.name: talesofstyles
blog.title: all the love my little ballsacks
blog.description: virginia | i suck at writing, but i still do sometimes.

summary: i’m way too emotional just thinking about the fact that harry is home. like, crying in the middle of the day kind of emotional....
body: i’m way too emotional just thinking about the fact that harry is home. like, crying in the middle of the day kind of emotional. i’m just so happy he’s home and that he get to be away from his busy life and just enjoy cosy days at home. he can just ditch those ugly arse granddad trousers and live in sweatpants and jumpers and cuddle his cats and fall asleep on the couch while he’s watching whatever it is on the telly. maybe he can play scrabbles or monopoly with his mum and have an actual conversation, not just a simple “how are you” when they’re on the phone while he’s away. i bet anne will cook his favourite dish and when he walks into the kitchen, telling his mum that he wants to help her, anne will tell him off and be like, “absolutely not. you just get cosy over there in the couch. you’re home, i’m not letting you do anything.” she’s smiling the entire time because she’s just so happy to have him back at home even just for a couple of days. her baby is home.

summary: So smut night. I love the idea of him just not being able to get enough of you. You go out to an art museum (based on recent...
question: So smut night. I love the idea of him just not being able to get enough of you. You go out to an art museum (based on recent events) and you had some wine as you were walking around and you're both slightly tipsy and you decide to go right to bed and you have the sweetest, slowest, him worshipping your body sex, his thumbs rubbing little circles on your thighs, hips, and finally your clit. This got a little one, so next part on the way...1/?
answer:
You’re all snuggled up and he looks over with that smirk and he breathes hotly next to your ear that he wants you again. He’s a little needier so it’s a little turning you over so he can take you from behind. You fall asleep but a couple of hours later, he wakes up needing you again. He can’t believe it and he feels bad for waking you up, but he can’t help it. He sees you so rarely, after all. He decides to wake you up by pulling your legs apart and giving you the best oral he’s ever given. You gasp as you fully wake up and see his gorgeous curls between your legs. He’s ravenously eating you and even after you come, he keeps on going until he gets you to come again. So then he’s all, “need yeh again, love. Can I have yeh?” You nod and you roll on top of him, kiss him like crazy and just ride that boy until he’s fucking spent. 😘

I AM NOT OKAY! IT IS 8AM AND IM HOT! WHAT A DELIGHT TO WAKE UP TO!


THANK YOOOOOOOOU!

summary: I don’t know if you know her but a latina actress, diane guerrero (She’s my fav) said that she has a crush on Harry and if he...
question: I don’t know if you know her but a latina actress, diane guerrero (She’s my fav) said that she has a crush on Harry and if he were just slightly a bit older, she wants to date him i mean... yes bitch please i ship the two so much
answer:
YEAH THE ONE FROM ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK!!!

They could be a cute couple tbf!

Lmao the moment I started posting my stories on here I guess I sort of signed my life away to never being with Harry personally so I do need to find someone to really ship him with…

Anyway yeah she’s cool!
